channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Photographer
channel.description:
## The Photographer (Neutral Special) **Passive:** Royal Blood [Only usable upon the death of a king] As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King.
**Passive:** Old Camera Model You can only have up to 2 photos stored on your camera.
**Day Ability:** Disclosure Choose one of your photos that will be announced to everyone. You gain immunity of being accused in this day.
**Day Ability:** Blackmail Choose a player and blackmail him by the photo [You have to select one photo in which he is captured, he won't know who you are]. Then you starting making with him deal, here is options: 1. **Forced Vote** - He gives you his accusing vote for the next day [He will can't vote next day and you will have extra vote] 2. **Gift, For me?** - He gives you a new camera in which you can have stored up to 3 photos. [Your photos are still there, they aren't deleted]
3. **Refusal** - He don't want to make a deal and give you anything so out of your anger you poison him. He will die after one whole day [That mean he will die in the end of the next day]. [It is kinda similar to Nightshade but victim have less time to be healed.].
**Night Ability:** Captured moment Choose a player to which you'll go and took a photo in which are informations about what happened at this room. At the start of the next day photo will show only to you and you will have to choose: 1. Save photo - You can use this photo by day ability **Disclosure** 2. Burn Photo - You will lose photo but you gain Death Immunity for next night.

Problem: Goes against the setting. There are cameras in medieval times?

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Photographer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I figured it out. Make sure the game ends with no more than 1 of each faction not counting yourself or the King.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Photographer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It might break the role entirely but I feel there is a difference way you could use this mechanic. For example:

Blackmail:

“Show someone a photo of them. You can anonymously whisper to them as long as you have the picture. You may disclose the picture on the same day you blackmail someone with it.”

It would need to have a different goal than the one I gave earlier.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Photographer
item.dc:creator: Finnland_Seal
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

You post the photo that makes him look like the Possessor and get him executed.

I didn’t mean it o_o Like it would be too OP I think… I just thought about that what I writed up. That you have a photo in which possesor went to someone and possesed him and you can decide, wheter disclosure it or make a deal with him

Edit 1: Or you know what? You are actually right. I messed it up. In my way he won’t can longer frame BD but in your way he can.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Photographer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I guess it works either way. I just like the idea of being able to get people accused for something that someone else did.

Example: You take a photo of the sheriff. The person the sheriff visits is possessed. You post the photo that makes him look like the Possessor and get him executed.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Photographer
item.dc:creator: Finnland_Seal
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Speaking photos. How about this?

Capture moment

Take a photo getting the effects of the person they visited (ex: Occupied, Killed, Healed) (Unlimited. Otherwise works like before)

Framed moment

Take a photo getting the effects of the person they visited. If theyre visitor wasn’t attacked then you drug them (they will always be attacked and healed) (2 Uses)

Night Ability: Captured moment
Choose a player to which you’ll go and took a photo in which are informations about what happened at this room.
That means you would see for example:
Person A went to Person B and guarded/killed/healed/poisoned/investigated etc. You would actaully know everything what happened “at this room” - Means that if Person B went to Person C, but Person A reaped Person B
soul in photo you will see/it will write that> Person A reaped Person B
soul. Is it enought clear? xD

NuclearBurrito:

Framed moment

Take a photo getting the effects of the person they visited. If theyre visitor wasn’t attacked then you drug them (they will always be attacked and healed) (1 Uses)

I like this idea but I think this class would have to much skills but I will see If I will add it

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Photographer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Speaking photos. How about this?

Capture moment
Take a photo getting the effects of the person they visited (ex: Occupied, Killed, Healed, Converted) (Unlimited. Otherwise works like before)

Framed moment
Take a photo getting the effects of the person they visited. If theyre visitor wasn’t attacked then you drug them (they will always be attacked and healed) (1 Uses)

Note: You are not told who they visited

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Photographer
item.dc:creator: Finnland_Seal
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

How about. “Live to see 6 people executed.”

Then you could change the refusal punishment to disclosing the photo without revealing the photographer.

That’s a nice idea! I think I’m gonna do it like you say… But then taking photos would be kinda usefull since you would reveal them only when your victim choose 3rd option…

Read full topic

item.description:
Note: those 6 people could be anyone.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Photographer
item.dc:creator: Finnland_Seal
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Btw there should be a blackmail option for the person to disclose the photo. That way you want to get something incriminating.

You would need to change captured moment though.

Well… I’ll think about it.

NuclearBurrito:

Btw what is the goal of this class?

Oh, damn I forgot about write it! I’ll edit some things next day as soon as I’ll be able to do it. But goal may be to successfully executed at least 1 BD and 2 Unseen/Cult. I didn’t want to make this BD because I wanted that role doing everything on her own. Idk I guess I have to think about it

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Photographer
item.dc:creator: Finnland_Seal
item.description:
Simon:

So with blackmail, the target chooses the effect, correct?

Does the poison pierce night immunity? because if it does not, mm/mos could just refuse the blackmail

Yes, victim chooses the option. Poison bypasses night immunity

Read full topic
